official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act to remove the jurisdiction of the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to license projects on fresh waters in the State of Hawaii.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Power Act to remove from the licensing jurisdiction of the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission hydroelectric power projects on fresh waters in the State of Hawaii.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act to remove the jurisdiction of the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to license projects on fresh waters in the State of Hawaii.
